title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For the correct identification of the magnetic force on the positively charged particles as they enter region 1

FB = qvB1, directed toward the bottom of the page

1 point is earned: For the correct identification of the electric force on the positively charged particles as they enter region 1

FE = qE, directed toward the top of the page
Fnet = ∑F = qE - qvB = ma

For the particle to move at constant velocity, a = 0

1 point is earned: For the correct application of Newton’s laws to obtain the equation needed to relate the speed of the particles to the electric and magnetic field strengths

qE - qvB1 = 0

v = E/B1

1 point is earned: For selecting “It curves toward the bottom of the page.”

1 point is earned: For an appropriate explanation

Example: The electric force FE = qE, directed upward, is the same for all speeds of the particle. However, the magnetic force FB = qvB1, directed downward, increases with increasing speed. Therefore if the speed of the particle is greater than that in part (a)i, then FB > FE. The resultant force on the particle as it enters region 1 is toward the bottom of the page, causing the particle to curve in that direction. The justification point could be earned only if the correct answer was selected.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
FB = qvB2

1 point is earned: For correctly substituting v = E/B1 from part (a)i
FB = qEB2/B1

1 point is earned: For correctly indicating that the direction is up or toward the top of the page
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

FB = qvB2

1 point is earned: For correctly substituting v = E/B1 from part (a)i

FB = qEB2/B1

1 point is earned: For correctly indicating that the direction is up or toward the top of the page

The student response earns one of the following points:

FB = qvB2

1 point is earned: For correctly substituting v = E/B1 from part (a)i

FB = qEB2/B1

1 point is earned: For correctly indicating that the direction is up or toward the top of the page

The student response earns all of the following points:

FB = qvB2

1 point is earned: For correctly substituting v = E/B1 from part (a)i

FB = qEB2/B1

1 point is earned: For correctly indicating that the direction is up or toward the top of the page

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For including in the description that the force is constant

1 point is earned: For including in the description that the direction changes

Example: The magnitude FB = qvB2 does not change because the particle is in a constant magnetic field B2 and the angle between the velocity and magnetic force remains constant at 90 ° MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaeyiSaalaaa@37E2@ . But as the particle curves the direction of its velocity changes, and the direction of the magnetic force also changes because it remains perpendicular to the velocity vector.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned: For an appropriate description that includes a statement that the path is circular

Example: When the particle is in region 2, it moves toward the top of the page in a circular arc. An explanation saying only that the path curved upward earned only 1 point. One earned point was deducted for any incorrect statement. For example, “circular, out of the page” earned only 1 point.
descriptions:

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For indicating that the net force provides the centripetal acceleration

Fnet = mv2/R

1 point is earned: For indicating that the net force is due to the magnetic field
Fnet = qvB2
qvB2 = mv2/R

Substituting v = E/B1 from part (a)i

1 point is earned: For the correct answer

q m = E B 1 B 2 R MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaSaaaeaaca WGXbaabaGaamyBaaaacqGH9aqpdaWcaaqaaiaadweaaeaacaWGcbWa aSbaaSqaaiaaigdaaeqaaOGaamOqamaaBaaaleaacaaIYaaabeaaki aadkfaaaaaaa@3E16@
